home.title: Kinguru - Organize and Attend Thematic Meetings with Expert Speakers
home.description: Discover, organize, and attend thematic meetings with expert speakers in cafes and restaurants. Explore upcoming events and sign up today!

events.title: Upcoming Events - Kinguru
events.description: Browse through upcoming thematic meetings and events. Join us for insightful sessions with expert speakers in cozy locations.

create.title: Create Your Event - Kinguru
create.description: Step into Kinguru’s intuitive event creation page. In just a few clicks, set up and customize your event, reach a wider audience, and make an impact. Your journey from idea to a fully organized thematic meeting starts here!

places.title: Places - Kinguru
places.description: Browse through our places store. Join us for insightful sessions with expert speakers in cozy locations.

create.title: Create Your Place - Kinguru
create.description: Step into Kinguru’s intuitive place creation page. In just a few clicks, set up and customize your place, reach a wider audience, and make an impact. Your journey from idea to a fully organized thematic meeting starts here!

privacy.title: Privacy Policy - Your Data is Safe with Kinguru
privacy.description: At Kinguru, we value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. Read our detailed privacy policy to understand how we collect, use, and safeguard your data, ensuring a secure and transparent experience.

terms.title: Terms & Conditions: Your Guide to Kinguru's Policies
terms.description: Get acquainted with Kinguru's Terms & Conditions. This page outlines our policies, ensuring transparency and clarity for all users. Read more to understand our guidelines.

cookie.title: Your Data, Your Control: Kinguru's Cookie Policy
cookie.description: Discover how Kinguru utilizes cookies to enhance your browsing experience. Our Cookie Policy page details their use, ensuring transparency and control over your data.

price.title: Speaker Subscriptions: Choose Your Plan with Kinguru
price.description: Amplify your impact with Kinguru's speaker subscription plans. From basic to pro, find the perfect tier for your speaking journey. Join us and expand your influence today!

hero.slug:
Choose free locations
Organize events,
And earn!
hero.description: Kinguru is a platform for organizing thematic meetings with speakers in cafes and restaurants.

dashboard.announce: On this page we have collected for you the most important news of the time.
dashboard.become_speaker: I want to become a speaker
dashboard.main_profile_fill_60: Fill out your profile at least 60% and get the opportunity to organize your own events.
dashboard.main_profile_speaker_minimum: To become a speaker you must complete your profile at least 60%
dashboard.main_popular_do_not_miss: Don't miss out on the hottest events in your city
dashboard.main_faq: Is there something you don't understand? Let's figure it out
dashboard.main_become_speaker_total: Become a speaker and monitor your success
dashboard.main_become_speaker_profit: Become a speaker and track your profits from events
dashboard.main_become_speaker_next_event: Become a speaker and keep track of all the news about your own event

places.new_place_creating: Adding a site to the platform
places.new_place_general_description: Provide a basic info about your place
places.new_places_was_not_created_description: Your premise wasn't created, please, review the steps
places.general_type_of_premises: Specify the type of event space
places.general_type_of_premises_helper: Please indicate the type of premises that most accurately reflects it.
places.general_title: Give your event space a name
places.general_title_placeholder: Loft in the center with a view of the city panorama
places.general_title_helper:
Grab the guest's attention and describe your space with a headline without including your business name.
Try including the following items:
Location - urban, city center, harbor.
Type of space - loft, studio, dance hall, penthouse.
Unique adjectives - industrial, rustic, spacious.
places.general_description: Add a description of your event space
places.general_description_placeholder: Please describe your event venue (minimum 280 characters).
places.general_description_helper:
Please include details about your premises so that guests have a full understanding of what the property offers.
Try to answer the following questions:
What types of events are suitable for your location?
What is the layout of the space and how can you best organize the use of its different zones?
What features or amenities are available in your space?

Do not include:
Personal contact information - Do not include your contact information, such as phone number, organization name, address, email, or links to a personal website.
places.general_rules: What rules apply in your premises?
places.general_rules_helper:
Please provide some rules regarding what activities are and are not acceptable in the area.
Example:
Smoking is prohibited inside the building.
Outside food orders are permitted.
Drinking alcohol is prohibited after 20:00.
Exception:
Cleaning Fee - Basic cleaning is the responsibility of the unit owner. In case you decide to charge additional cleaning fees, you can clarify this information in the following section.
places.general_area: What size room can guests book? (m²)
places.general_area_helper: Please only indicate the size of the room guests can use when booking.
places.general_min_capacity_helper: You must specify the number of guests
places.general_max_capacity_helper: You must specify the number of guests
places.general_age_restrictions: Who is allowed into your premises?
places.general_age_restrictions_helper: Typically, age restrictions only apply to establishments that serve alcohol.
places.features_parking_area: Please provide information about parking options
places.features_parking_area_helper: Is there parking in your area or nearby?
places.features_camera_or_audio_recoding_helper: Are there CCTV or audio recording systems in the premises?
places.features_does_premises_have_wifi: Is there WiFi in the premises?
places.features_wifi_credentials: Please provide your Wi-Fi login and password
places.features_wifi_credentials_helper: Make internet access more convenient for your guests by providing them with Wi-Fi connection information. This information will only be available to guests after they have booked the room.
places.features_amenities_helper: Any amenities you select must be included in your hourly rate. If you have additional services that require an additional fee, please do not list them here. These may be added in the next section.
places.new_place_location_helper: Your premises address will not be publicly displayed on your Kinguru page. It will only be available to guests once they have made a reservation.
places.location_use_same_billing_address: Can this address be used for billing?
places.location_route_to_premises_helper:
Help your guests and event participants find you.
Try including the following information:
The route to your space, how to access the building, the buttons to open the doors, the floor your space is on, the ability to use stairs and the elevator.
places.pricing_cleaning_fee: Is the cleaning fee included in the hourly rate?
places.pricing_cleaning_fee_helper: You are responsible for cleaning after each booking. You may charge a fee to cover the costs involved.
places.pricing_rental_price_by_hour_helper: Please select a base hourly rate. After creating your ad, you can adjust your prices to account for the cost of participation and additional services.
